Package Geometry

Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
Geometry.Polygon
Geometry.Triangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGeometricShape<Polygon>
public class Triangle extends Polygon
Represents a triangle A triangle is a polygon with 3 sides
